name: DeFi, MEV auctions, and what we need to do for DeFi to *compete* with CeFi
description: DeFi, MEV auctions, and what we need to do for DeFi to *compete* with CeFi

speakers.name: Uri Klarman
speakers.bio: Uri Klarman, the Co-Founder and CEO of bloXroute, received his Ph.D. from Northwestern University for his pioneering research on the blockchain network layer. bloXroute - the “crown jewel” of his Ph.D. thesis, allows DeFi traders and market actors to see trading opportunities and execute them faster to make better trades.
